segments.text: Generally speaking , we provide bikes for both gentlemen and ladies , size 19 , 21 , 23 , 25 and 27 inches . We can vary the colors according to the buyer's requirements . Here are the catalogues and the pattern books . They will give you a rough idea about our products .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am interested in your flying pigeon bicycles . I think some of these items will find a ready market in Canada . But what our customers appreciate most is a reliable product .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be reliable is the strong point of our products . As a matter of fact , it's always our practice to supply high quality goods at reasonable prices . Flying pigeon is the best of its kind at the price .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then I'd like to know your availability of the products and the terms of sales , such as mode of payment , delivery , discounts , etc .
segments.speaker: S1
